title: Iridium secures $94 million U.S. Space Force contract for satellite communications support
summary: The contract is for ground infrastructure, including a service center that supports DoD users of Iridium communications

title: Revolv Space seeks to expand satellite duty cycles
summary: Startup Revolv Space, based in the Netherlands and Italy, seeks to carve out a niche for itself as a small satellite power-generation specialist.

title: Why we need to take satellite ground station security seriously
summary: While major strides are being made to protect in-orbit payloads, the ground stations that control those satellites and collect telemetry from them may be woefully undersecured.

title: Europe seeks to launch into clearing skies
summary: As Ariane 6 and Vega C face high stakes, ESA champions space sustainability, says Josef Aschbacher, director general of ESA.

title: Making the case for multi-orbit broadband
summary: A Q&A with Eutelsat Group CEO Eva Berneke on the French company's multi-orbit broadband.

title: Online calculator helps startups comply with U.S.  regulations
summary: Aegis Space Law is offering a free online calculator to help U.S. space companies navigate the complex regulatory landscape.

title: Astra consolidates facilities
summary: Astra Space, still low on cash as it works to finalize a deal to take the company private, is consolidating its operations at its headquarters less than two years after expanding into a new facility.

title: Congressional language alters plans for NASA’s Habitable Worlds Observatory
summary: Congressional language intended to accelerate work on a future NASA space telescope has the side effect of forcing the agency to disband a team it created to guide the mission’s early development.

title: Chang’e-6: Moon samples collected and launched into lunar orbit
summary: Material from the far side of the moon has begun its journey for Earth after Chinese spacecraft collected samples and launched them into lunar orbit.

title: Chang'e-6 Launches Ascent Vehicle to Lunar Orbit Following Completion Of Lunar Sample Collection
summary: Chang'e-6 Launches Ascent Vehicle to Lunar Orbit Following Completion Of Lunar Sample Collection
